django.contrib.gis.gdal.driver
==============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.gdal.driver


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.driver.Driver


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Driver(dr_input)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.gdal.base.GDALBase`


   Wrap a GDAL/OGR Data Source Driver.
   For more information, see the C API documentation:
   https://gdal.org/api/vector_c_api.html
   https://gdal.org/api/raster_c_api.html


   .. py:attribute:: ptr


   .. py:method:: ensure_registered()
      :classmethod:


      Attempt to register all the data source drivers.



   .. py:method:: driver_count()
      :classmethod:


      Return the number of GDAL/OGR data source drivers registered.



   .. py:property:: name

      Return description/name string for this driver.
